name: LOVENOTES Pink Woods Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Fresh.Scent Type:Fresh Florals.Key Notes:Jasmine Petals, Tonka, Cashmere Woods.Fragrance Description:Airy. Dreamy. Entrancing..About the Bottle:A harmonious blend of elegance and innovation. The exclusive scent is contained in a classic yet iconic, soft A-shaped bottle that exudes sophistication..About the Fragrance:LOVENOTES by Ariana Grande is a personal endeavor to make scent the ultimate and universal love language. Each scent in this exclusive fragrance collection is a love letter from Ariana to the world, conveying timeless and evocative messages of joy, gratitude, and affection.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Denatonium Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Limonene, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to pulse points: wrist, chest, and neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing soo many mixed reviews that are vastly different from eachother on this fragrance, and knowing what it smells like on me, I think this perfume really just depends on skin chemistry.   This will smell different on everyone. On me, this literally dries down and ONLY smells like a soapy grapefruit (which is the bergamot), But it smells very specifically of grapefruit. I don’t get a single tad bit of woodiness or florals, tonka, cotton candy, or anything else. Just GRAPEFRUIT with a clean soapiness.  Skin chemistry is so interesting lol.  So for that reason, I don’t think this is a safe blind buy at all.. Take every review with a grain of salt bc this will likely smell different on you. I am SO glad I didn’t buy the huge 4.2oz bottle. But paying $32 for the 10ml travel spray was total a rip off..
great I was looking for a more of fruity floral but its ok

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The package was cold from shipping but I sprayed some perfume on anyway. It wasn't a good smell so I sprayed some on myself again after it warmed up and it didn't smell any better. I'm very disappointed. I can't even describe the scent because there aren't any aromas that I recognize.
